mapper.sql: ad_code, parent_ad_code, name, center, level, create_user_id, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into biz_district (ad_code, parent_ad_code, name, center, level, create_user_id, create_time) values
(#{item.adCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.parentAdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.center,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
